Text: Florida Recount Deadline Standsstate judge has ruled that the Florida secretary of state may ignore vote results submitted after the pm ET deadline but must consider all appropriate circumstances in effect leaving the final decision on the state recounts up to the Florida secretary of state Go to ABCNEWScom for the latest developments on the crucial Florida recount And take a look at a profile of Florida Secretary of State Katherine Harris the woman behind the recount sectionspoliticsDailyNewsElectionharrisbio html ABCNEWScom Up to the Moment Up to You tm You received this mail because you subscribed via ABCNEWScom at servicemailsubhtml If you would like to stop receiving these mailings unsubscribe at servicemailunsubhtml Please do not respond to this mail Questions or comments can be submitted at serviceabccontacthtml

RECOUNT BATTLE CONTINUES IN FLORIDAfight for the Florida ballot continues today with a number of ongoing developments Palm Beach County began a hand recount of ballots at am ET this morning but halted it pending a judges decision on what constitutes a valid vote MiamiDade County Tuesday night voted against a full recount after a sample recount showed little change from the original vote total The Gore campaign is considering court action to try to force a review of the MiamiDade tally Another recount might also be possible in Broward County where Democratic Party officials have already gone to court George W Bush is leading Al Gore in Floridas official vote count by votes after most Florida counties met a deadline yesterday set by Florida Secretary of State Katherine Harris Harris has set a pm ET deadline today to receive explanations from counties on why they intend to revise their figures Go to ABCNEWScom to follow all of these ongoing developments ABCNEWScom Up to the Moment Up to You tm You received this mail because you subscribed via ABCNEWScom at servicemailsubhtml If you would like to stop receiving these mailings unsubscribe at servicemailunsubhtml Please do not respond to this mail Questions or comments can be submitted at serviceabccontacthtml

GORE TO SPEAK AT PMPresident Al Gore will be speaking at pm ET to respond to a judges decision upholding the Florida Secretary of States refusal to include hand recounts in the states final vote tally The Gore team is appealing the decision Go to ABCNEWScom to watch it live and to follow all the days election news ABCNEWScom Up to the Moment Up to You tm You received this mail because you subscribed via ABCNEWScom at servicemailsubhtml If you would like to stop receiving these mailings unsubscribe at servicemailunsubhtml Please do not respond to this mail Questions or comments can be submitted at serviceabccontacthtml
